TopicTitle: Ship turns when A or D is pressed while EVA HELP

Articles.Content:
Title says all I can turn the ship while EVA and now its getting annoying. I have seen people call it the "Remove control ship bug". I was on the Mun messing around and when I go left or right the ship turns with me and turns over therefore making EVA's almost impossible without tipping over the ship. I can see the engine gimbals turning when I press A or D so i know its a bugGoing to the KSC helps but it turns off the SAS making the ship very unstable. I need help.

Edited May 29, 2015 by Dspan_000
how did you fixed it? perhaps if you put a solution, someone with the same sort of problem can find your way to fix

This bug appears when there is trim input in the craft. Pressing any of the control keys causes SAS to unlock for all ships in physics range. So any ships that have trim input will rotate when the SAS unlocks. So it's not quite "remote control."

how did you fixed it? perhaps if you put a solution, someone with the same sort of problem can find your way to fix

You fix it by switching to the vessel, and pressing MOD+X (Alt+X in windows) to zero out the trim state.

Cheers,
